word: \93The sabbath was made for man, and not man for the sabbath,\94 Jesus said. The institutions that God has established are for the benefit of humankind. . . . The law of Ten Commandments, of which the Sabbath forms a part, God gave to His people as a blessing. \93The Lord commanded us,\94 said Moses, \93to do all these statutes, to fear the Lord our God, for our good always, that he might preserve us alive\94 (Deuteronomy 6:24).\97The Desire of Ages, pp. 287, 288.
